resources.string: Tap lock to expand/collapse by default
Tap on an image to add a description. Long press to enter selection mode and delete any unwanted images.

Important note: this only shows the troops in the attacker\' s transports, hero command and air command, and which of their droids were \'live\' during the attack. It is not possible to confirm which troops were deployed, or what was in the attacker\'s SC.

Important note: This Dashboard uses the player account you select to log in and retrieve the data displayed here. This means it could trigger heroic defence timers, or even kick you out of any active session you have if you are playing on another device. IE, donâ€™t be attacking on another device when you click the blue button!
